name: Basalt's Hell
description:
Ice Knight Dian must escape from the slain dragon Basalt's lair! Make use of her power to create floating ice tiles as you navigate the volcano. But watch out! With her sword lodged in the neck of the dragon, she has no way to attack her enemies. 

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys: jump, move left and right.
  • Spacebar: create up to ten ice tiles.
  • Helmet: collect these to add HP and increase your armor.
  • Power Gloves: collect these to gain the ability to break certain tiles.

Other Notes:

  • Click on the game window to calibrate inputs.
  • Stuck? Try finding one of the hidden portals!
  • The game is still very rough. 
  • Some imagery of blood.
  • Enemies can also break orange tiles.
  • You may be able to jump higher by spawning ice tiles in different patterns.
